description: Jamaican Jerk Black Bean Tacos with Roasted Corn Salsa. 25 minute Tacos, full of flavor. Vegan Soy-free Recipe. Can be gluten-free with gf tortillas or soft tacos. Summer Tacos
name: Jamaican Jerk Black Bean Tacos with Roasted Corn Salsa
recipeIngredient: 30 oz can black beans or about 3 cups cooked
1/2 tsp salt (depends on if the beans were salted)
1/2 to 3/4 tsp cayenne ( or use habanero)
a good dash of cinnamon (nutmeg and all spice.)
1.5 cups of corn kernels or 2 ears of corn
salt (pepper, cayenne and lime juice to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the black beans, wash, drain and set aside. Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onions and cook until translucent. 4 to 5 mins.
Add the beans, spices, herbs and water and mix well. At this point, you can add in some chopped veggies. Partially cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Stir occasionally. Taste and adjust salt and heat.

video.description:
Jamaican Jerk Black Bean Tacos with Roasted Corn Salsa! 25 Mins. 
ðŸ’™ðŸ§¡ FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2016/08/jamaican-jerk-black-bean-tacos-roasted-corn-salsa.html
ðŸ’™ðŸ§¡ MY COOKBOOKBS: https://veganricha.com/mybooks

These super easy Tacos come together within minutes. Use canned black beans, add Jamaican jerk spice blend and onions and cook for a few. Meanwhile roast some corn, shuck and make a bowl of salsa. Assemble, add some avocado and lime juice and serve.

I use spices ahd herbs to make up the Jamaican Blend. You can use premade jamaican jerk blend or other blends like cajun spice, chili blend etc. Toss in some chopped veggies or summer squash to cook with the beans. Add toppings of choice such as vegan sour cream, guacamole or other creamy dressing. Vegan Glutenfree Soyfree Nutfree Recipe.
